苬字的基本解释

苬
xiú
一种菌类植物，即“木灵芝”。

苬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiú］
［《廣韻》似由切，平尤，邪。］
一种菌类植物，即“木灵芝”。《尔雅·释草》：“苬，芝。”郭璞注：“芝，一歲三華，瑞草。”一说“菌”的讹字。郝懿行行疏：“苬字不見它書，孫氏星衍嘗致疑問。余按《類聚》九十八引《爾雅》作'菌，芝。'蓋菌字破壞作‘苬’耳。”

苬字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　苬； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1024第06
【唐韻】似由切，音囚。【爾雅·釋草】苬芝。【郭註】一年三花，爲瑞草也。　又【類篇】夷周切，音由。義同。

苬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
苬字的起名意思

木灵芝，一种菌类植物，一年三花，为瑞草也。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
xiú
A kind of fungus plant, namely "wood ganoderma".
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiú］
["Guangyun" seems to be cut, flat, and evil. ]
A kind of fungus plant, namely "wood ganoderma". "Erya Shicao": "Zi, Zhi." Guo Pu's note: "Zhi, one-year-old Sanhua, Seocao." One said the mistake of "bacteria". Hao Yixing's scribbles: "The word Li is not in the book, and Sun Xingyan has a question. I quoted "Erya" according to "Like Ju" 98 as "Mushroom, Zhi." The word "Li" is destroyed as "Li" ear.
Li

[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　苬; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1024 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Seems like you cut, sound prisoner. 【Erya·Shucao】Lizhi. [Guo's Note] Three flowers a year are Seocho.　[Classes] Yi Zhou cut, sound by. The same meaning.
